titleNullable: Brazilian sales of controlled drugs by ANVISA
subtitleNullable: All sales of controlled drugs in Brazil, from 2014 to november 2021
descriptionNullable:
This dataset was just the compilation of all monthly files from the following Portal de Dados Abertos page in a unique dataset:

https://dados.gov.br/dados/conjuntos-dados/venda-de-medicamentos-controlados-e-antimicrobianos---medicamentos-manipulados

All the credits for this dataset are for the authors. I only automate the files download and concatenate them. 

basicaly this dataset contains the history of selled manipulated drugs controlled by ANVISA from 2014 to november 2021. Each line is an individual sell operation, with detailed composition information of the medicine selled.

some usage sugestions and questions that I'm working in:

- What drug are in/decreasing their consumption?
- Have some sazonal effect, like seasons?
- Can we measure mental health by meltal drugs consumption? 
- What the effect of COVID pandemic on drugs consumption, even those don't have correlation with the disease treatment?
- Regression models to predict future sellings
